1.title: Secret Life of an Author 01: Writing Tips + Name That Song Challenge ft. Garrett Miller
1.plot: Join author RJ Tolson and singer, as well as fellow author Garrett Miller as the two give you tips on finishing a non-fiction book and for some fun with the "Name that song Challenge".

2.title: Skyview Startup Office Tour! Let's Visit RJ's Startup Headquarters for Pearit
2.plot: RJ shamelessly takes you through what it like's to meet at his office and the startup space itself for his tech startup, Pearit (InternMagic, Sparklift, InternLogic).

3.title: How to Write a YA Fiction Novel Mini-Series Part 1: The World of Writing Books
3.plot: RJ always get's asked tips on how to write a novel. To help, split into multiple segments, he doesn't just tell you how he did it, he give tips, suggestions, and when he can, he'll show it.

4.title: Follow RJ to Work at His Startup Pearit (A Day in the Life)
4.plot: As RJ builds his new funded startup, Pearit (InternMagic), he takes you along for the ride; from waking up with him in LA and into work, all the way to an engagement party at night.

5.title: Top 8 Airbnb Hosting Tips - SuperHosting & Success
5.plot: New to Airbnb hosting or a veteran but looking to improve your ratings, reviews, sales, and or overall success? Hear them give their secrets to success.

6.title: Tesloop Review: How to Save Money on Transportation for Trips in a Tesla
6.plot: With RJ's flight going out of San Diego while he lives in LA, he tried the new startup service Tesloop, which provides an incredible luxury experience at a great price from one city to another in a self-driving Tesla.

7.title: RJ's September Author & Entrepreneur Tour: Playlist Live DC VIP Panelist & Vendor + Rooftop Parties and Collabs
7.plot: Go along with RJ and his team in this three-part trip over two weeks of RJ's tour season. Panels, VIP parties, startup events, and traveling all in one.

8.title: RJ's September Author & Entrepreneur Tour: Road Trip to NYC
8.plot: Driving is fun - Join RJ's creative director of Pearit, Kevin E Wood, and head of Business Development, Harrison Chen along with RJ as they rent a car, drive up, and RJ's dog Cloud keeps them company.

9.title: Are Healthy Drinks Actually Healthy?! SECRETS (Drink Busters Challenge)
9.plot: Joined by Founder of Made With Love and Renew Juicery, Brooke Rewa, joins RJ Tolson for the Drink Busters Challenge and some lifestyle tips using healthy drinks.

10.title: Dating Advice: How to Slay a First Date (Feat. Catherine Bybee
10.plot: Dive into something new: Bestselling Romance and famed Author Catherine Bybee and RJ (a Bestselling Young Adult Fantasy Author) answer questions meant to help you get ready to slay that first date.

11.title: Author Tour: Reader's Favorite and the Miami Book Festival
11.plot: RJ's in Miami on tour as an Author to do a keynote speech and accept an award for his Manga, True Life, and he's loving it. On top of it all, it's time to meet some new award-winning writers.

12.title: RJ's September Author & Entrepreneur Tour: Hosting Startup Events and Expanding Business Part 3
12.plot: Join the trio as they adventure and host events for RJ's startup Pearit's brand InternLogic in New York City while having some big meetings in CT. Business, play, food, driving, and dogs. Part 3 of September Author and Entrepreneur Tour.

13.title: RJ's September Author & Entrepreneur Tour: Exploring DC and San Diego With Co-Workers Part 4
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: RJ Brings Back the Dead
1.plot: RJ dishes out if he could, who he would bring back from the dead and why.

2.title: Open Eyes: Lyric Video Release
2.plot: Music video release for Open Eyes (Lyric Video) ft. Addie Nicole performed by R.J. Tolson and Addie Nicole.

3.title: How to Become a Thrive Global Contributor
3.plot: RJ recently (at the time) became a contributor for Arianna Huffington's (of the Huffington Post) new startup Thrive Global and thought he would share how to become one too.

4.title: Fashion Show: LAFS Showcase '17 and Tatiana Shabelnik Collection
4.plot: Attending LAFS Fashion week to support his dear, close friend fashion designer Tatiana Shabelnik in Beverly Hills, RJ decided to preview the event.

imdb.plot outline: It all started a 17, but what happens behind the media interviews, tour, and business innovations? Journey with bestselling author, internationally recognized entrepreneur, actor, and model RJ Tolson as he covers some of the events on his path to continued success along with his daily life, world touring, tips and advice, creative projects, and overall adventure.
imdb.title: RJ Tolson Vlogs
plot: Join bestselling author, internationally recognized entrepreneur, actor, and model RJ Tolson as he covers some of his path to continued success along with his daily life, world touring, tips, creative projects, and overall adventure.::RJTIO
